title: For one day, get a lifetime of Babbel Language Learning access at one of the year’s best prices.
content:
Macworld

Sometimes, you don’t get the luxury of time to think about and analyze an offer. When something you want is on sale for literally only a matter of hours, you’ve got to make the leap and lock in your price now before the deal is gone.

That’s why this one-day Presidents’ Day Sale price on a lifetime subscription to the Babbel Language Learning system is a prime “strike while the iron is hot” type situation.  

Developed in collaboration with more than 150 expert linguists and teachers, Babbel offers tightly constructed 10- to 15-minute sessions in 14 core languages, allowing learners to quickly and effectively communicate in a new language. The app engages users in conversations with native speakers on universal topics like travel, family, business, and food. This approach builds core words and phrases, facilitating fast-paced learning that leads to fluent speech and genuine conversation.

This deal is rated an average of 4.8/5 stars by verified purchasers and Babbel has over 10 million users around the world. Discover why during this one-day price drop. 

Regularly almost $600, this 24-hour offer cuts the price on your Babbel Language Learning: Lifetime Subscription (All Languages) to one the lowest of the year, just $149.97.
